dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Ola joins Uber, denies implementing phone model-based pricing in India
News Content: (Reuters) - Indian ride-hailing firm Ola Consumer on Friday said it does not set fares based on a user's phone model, a day after global rival Uber denied allegations of differential pricing for Android and Apple phones.

Ola and Uber received notices from an Indian government consumer body on Thursday, directed by consumer affairs minister Pralhad Joshi, following media reports and complaints that Apple users were charged higher for the same ride than those using phones that ran on Android operating systems.

"We have a homogenous pricing structure for all our customers and we do not differentiate based on the operating system of the user's cellphone for identical rides," an Ola Consumer spokesperson said.

"We have clarified the same to the Central Consumer Protection Authority (CCPA) today, and we will work with them to clear any misunderstanding in this regard."

Apple and Google have not yet responded to Reuters' requests for comments.

(Reporting by Nandan Mandayam in Bengaluru; Editing by Janane Venkatraman)



Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news article discusses allegations of price discrimination by ride-hailing companies Ola and Uber in India, based on the user's phone operating system (Android vs. iOS).  Apple is mentioned only incidentally as the target of some of the alleged price discrimination.  The news focuses on Ola and Uber's denials and their responses to the Indian consumer protection authority.  There is no direct impact on Apple's business or financials mentioned in the article. Therefore, the news is unlikely to significantly affect Apple's stock price. Any price movement would likely be due to other market factors, not this specific news.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Ola joins Uber, denies implementing phone model-based pricing in India",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.5,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.5
}
```
